author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DALILA MOVING WESTWARD AND AWAY FROM THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO...
summary: ...DALILA MOVING WESTWARD AND AWAY FROM THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 2:00 AM MST Sun Jun 15 the center of Dalila was located near 18.0, -107.2 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DALILA MOVING WESTWARD AND AWAY FROM THE COAST OF SOUTHWESTERN MEXICO... As of 2:00 AM MST Sun Jun 15 the center of Dalila was located near 18.0, -107.2 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 993 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Dalila (EP4/EP042025)
